local_intent: Execute a single leftward push of the T block (0.1 m at 180°) after confirming visibility and yaw=90, with a brief align, then verify visibility.
assumptions: TCP yaw has been set to 90 degrees earlier
Block remains visible during the push
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer-phase micro-push consistent with the global plan: verify visibility, ensure yaw=90, align to the block, push 0.1 m at 180°, then verify.
